references: Related: Ord 7708, Ord 11461, Ord 13242, Ord 19605, Ord 25009
summary: An Ordinance specifying and adopting a system or plan proposed by The City of Seattle for enlarging and extending the municipal light and power plant and system constructed and acquired pursuant to the provisions of Ordinance No. 7708, Ordinance No. 11461, Ordinance No. 13242, Ordinance No. 19605 and Ordinance No. 25009, declaring the estimated cost thereof, as near as may be, authorizing and indebtedness therefor, and submitting the same for ratification or rejection to the qualified voters of said city, at the general election to be held in said city on the 4th day of March, 1913.
